---
title: "Submission Checklist"
---

1. class name is in Proper Case (**C**lass**N**ame) -- the first letter of every word, inclusing the first word, is uppercase while the remaining letters are lowercase
1. class name matches file name (`ClassName.java`)
1. method and variable names are Camel Case (method**N**ame) --  the first letter of each word **after the first** is uppercase
1. package name is all lowercase and starts with `package com.gradescope.`
1. set your methods as `static` if instructed to do so
